Staring At The Sun | Sungazer Music Visuals

Client:

Staring At The Sun

Project Length:

1 Month

Scope:

Creative Direction

The Challenge

Designing a Multimedia Visual Album Experience.

Staring at the Sun wanted a visual identity that extended beyond traditional album artwork—something that could evolve alongside their music, build an interactive narrative, and engage audiences across streaming platforms and social media. My role was to develop a cohesive 3D animated aesthetic that translated seamlessly across Spotify Canvas loops, animated music videos, and cryptic promotional content that would tease future releases.

Crafting a Cinematic Visual Identity

Sungazer's single artwork is a 3D rendering made entirely in Blender. We iterated on different motion designs for a Spotify canvas, including an animated version of the artwork. Our chosen direction emphasized the lore and worldbuilding we're developing for the project.

Designed for Multi-Platform Engagement

I produced looping Spotify Canvas animations, teaser trailers, and short-form promotional assets, ensuring a unified aesthetic across music streaming platforms, social media, and YouTube.

Expanding the Narrative Through Hidden Details

The visuals were designed to tease cryptic messages and hidden lore elements, making the project more than just an album—it became an interactive storytelling experience.

The visuals for Sungazer are only the first small step of this project, and I plan to update this page as we continue to release more artwork together. For now, check out the band's debut single on your music platform of choice!

My Roles

  • Creative Direction
  • Art Direction
  • Animation Direction
  • Marketing Strategy

Let's Create Something Great.

Looking for an experienced creative leader with a proven track record directing high-impact campaigns for world-class clients? I’d love to hear from you.

I’m especially passionate about impact-driven work. If your project champions social progress and helping others, let’s connect. I thrive on problem-solving and R&D, and love to solve complex creative challenges.

Whether you’re reaching out about a potential collaboration, an opportunity, or just to say hello, I'll try to get back to you as soon as possible. Looking forward to hearing from you!
